name: Bouncing Ball - A simple, addictive arcade game
name_original: Bouncing Ball - A simple, addictive arcade game
description:
Play the amazing Boucing Ball game for free and try to beat the record!

You can tap left or right screen fast to switch the colored circle to correct ball's color before it lands or GAME OVERS!

Sharing highest scores to your friends.

This game currently ads free.

It's a very addicting game!! Try it out today!
